mapper.select: SELECT C.CON_ID , AT.CON_ID , AT.SEQ , DL.DL_CD_NM AS ALT_DIV , AT.ALT_CON_DATE , AT.CON_ST_DATE , AT.CON_ED_DATE , AT.SUPP_AMT , AT.VAT_AMT , AT.REMARK , AT.CONFIRM_YN , AT.CON_NO , CU.CUST_NM FROM BM_CON_INFO C LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_CON_ALT AT ON C.CON_ID = AT.CON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_CUST_INFO CU ON C.CUST_ID = CU.CUST_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL ON AT.ALT_DIV = DL.DL_CD WHERE C.CON_ID = #{value} ORDER BY CON_ED_DATE DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.CON_ID , A.CON_NM , A.CONFIRM_YN , IFNULL(B.CON_ST_DATE,A.CON_ST_DATE) AS CON_ST_DATE , IFNULL(B.CON_ED_DATE,A.CON_ED_DATE) AS CON_ED_DATE , IFNULL(B.ALT_DIV, "신규") AS ALT_DIV , IFNULL(B.SUPP_AMT, A.SUPP_AMT) AS SUPP_AMT , IFNULL(B.VAT_AMT, A.VAT_AMT) AS VAT_AMT , IFNULL(B.REMARK , A.REMARK) AS REMARK FROM (SELECT CON_ID , CON_NM , CON_ST_DATE , CON_ED_DATE , SUPP_AMT , VAT_AMT , CONFIRM_YN , REMARK FROM BM_CON_INFO WHERE CONFIRM_YN = "Y" ) AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT C.CON_ID , C.CON_ST_DATE , C.CON_ED_DATE , C.ALT_DIV , C.SUPP_AMT , C.VAT_AMT , C.REMARK FROM (SELECT AL.SEQ , DL.DL_CD_NM AS ALT_DIV , AL.CON_ID , CI.CON_NM , AL.CON_ST_DATE , AL.CON_ED_DATE , AL.CONFIRM_YN , AL.SUPP_AMT , AL.VAT_AMT , AL.REMARK FROM BM_CON_ALT AL LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_CON_INFO CI ON AL.CON_ID = CI.CON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL ON AL.ALT_DIV = DL.DL_CD WHERE AL.CONFIRM_YN = "Y" GROUP BY AL.SEQ DESC ) AS C GROUP BY C.CON_ID) AS B ON B.CON_ID = A.CON_ID ) AS D WHERE CON_ED_DATE > NOW() AND ALT_DIV != "종료"
AND ( CON_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') OR ALT_DIV LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%'))

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.CON_ID , A.CON_NM , A.CONFIRM_YN , IFNULL(B.CON_ST_DATE,A.CON_ST_DATE) AS CON_ST_DATE , IFNULL(B.CON_ED_DATE,A.CON_ED_DATE) AS CON_ED_DATE , IFNULL(B.ALT_DIV, "신규") AS ALT_DIV , IFNULL(B.SUPP_AMT, A.SUPP_AMT) AS SUPP_AMT , IFNULL(B.VAT_AMT, A.VAT_AMT) AS VAT_AMT , IFNULL(B.REMARK , A.REMARK) AS REMARK FROM (SELECT CON_ID , CON_NM , CON_ST_DATE , CON_ED_DATE , SUPP_AMT , VAT_AMT , CONFIRM_YN , REMARK FROM BM_CON_INFO WHERE CONFIRM_YN = "Y" ) AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT C.CON_ID , C.CON_ST_DATE , C.CON_ED_DATE , C.ALT_DIV , C.SUPP_AMT , C.VAT_AMT , C.REMARK FROM (SELECT AL.SEQ , DL.DL_CD_NM AS ALT_DIV , AL.CON_ID , CI.CON_NM , AL.CON_ST_DATE , AL.CON_ED_DATE , AL.CONFIRM_YN , AL.SUPP_AMT , AL.VAT_AMT , AL.REMARK FROM BM_CON_ALT AL LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_CON_INFO CI ON AL.CON_ID = CI.CON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL ON AL.ALT_DIV = DL.DL_CD WHERE AL.CONFIRM_YN = "Y" AND AL.CON_ED_DATE > NOW() AND DL.DL_CD_NM != "종료" GROUP BY AL.SEQ DESC ) AS C GROUP BY C.CON_ID) AS B ON B.CON_ID = A.CON_ID ) AS D WHERE CON_ED_DATE > NOW()
AND ( CON_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') OR ALT_DIV LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%'))
SELECT CON_ID , SEQ , ALT_DIV , CON_NM , ALT_CON_DATE , CON_ST_DATE , CON_ED_DATE , SUPP_AMT , VAT_AMT , REMARK , CONFIRM_YN , CON_NO FROM BM_CON_ALT WHERE SEQ = #{value}
